children.text: My name is Jeremy and for the past 7 years I have been independently studying in the field of computer science. I have completed several projects for freelance clients and my business including front end user interfaces, static websites, full stack applications, single page applications (SPA) and eCommerce Sites. Beyond this, I have also completed a variety of courses related to different elements of computer science and web development. I am resourceful and passionate about technology. I have a strong technical aptitude, a detail-oriented mindset and insatiable curiosity for learning new tools and languages.
The following are my technical strengths:
Building full stack web applications using React, Gatsby and Ruby on Rails
User interfaces using React, JavaScript, Jekyll, ERB, HAML, CSS, Liquid, Styled Components and Sass with some familiarity of AngularJs
Ruby, JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3 and some familiarity of C and PHP
Integration and functional tests with Jasmine, Cucumber, Rspec and Capybara
Test Driven Development and Agile processes
Experience using Git to manage multiple project repositories
Experience developing in both Linux and macOS using the CLI

With 15 yearsâ€™ experience running a small business as a registered massage therapist, I have experience in critical decision making, excellent communication skills and extensive experience with ongoing, concise documentation.
